page.title: 06AXBRIDGE CLUBS
page.content: There are many clubs in Axbridge. Examples{-Youth Club, Old People's {club, Fishing Club, Yachting Club, {Bingo Club, Cubs and Scouts, Brownies {and Guides}and quite a few more. The {Fishing Club}is quite popular. Over 50 people belong to this club.{The Youth {Club }can be good fun and enjoyable especially for discos. {Bingo club}is popular mostly with old ladies. They go to fill in their spare time. {Scouts}are held every Wednesday and Friday evenings at the Church House in Axbridge Square. More about Fishing - beyond Axbridge there is a{Fishing Club.}There are just over 50 people who fish near Cheddar Reservoir in the clay pits.The licence fee costs Â£10 per year. They made the pools accidentally when they were digging for clay.
